column8: RTF scan<ref name="Reformat RTF">Can reformat references in a properly saved RTF document  allowing limited use in OpenOffice.org Writer  StarOffice  FrameMaker  Microsoft Works  WordPad  WordPerfect  Google Docs and others.</ref>

column2: <ref>See JabRef FAQ: Field Mapping between MS-Office and JabRef.</ref>

column3: <ref>Requires the Desktop App open to choose references.</ref>

column5: <ref>Refbase can create a spreadsheet for import into an OO.o database to use the native OO.o bibliography tool. Refbase's MySQL database can additionally be used directly by OO.o http://wiki.refbase.net/index.php/OO.o_Writer_integration.</ref>
